name: UpdateCasePriority
description:
Update the priority of a specific case.

This tool updates the priority level of a given case in the system. It should be called when a change in priority is required for case management.

parameters.name: case_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the case, either UUID or key.

parameters.name: case_priority
parameters.description: Specify the priority level of the case. Valid options are: 'NOT_DEFINED', 'P1', 'P2', 'P3', 'P4', 'P5'.

parameters.name: case_resource_type
parameters.description: Specifies the type of resource, should be set to 'case'.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.
